name: Pincho, where are you?~
description:
After a full day work, you decide to take a break. This is a game about procrastination, and playing hide and seek with your cat Pincho.

Gameplay:

Pincho will hide around the house, and will meow to give you clues to his location. 

  • Use WASD to move around.
  • You can open the game menu using ESC or by clicking on the laptop.

When you find Pincho, he will change his hiding place. There is no time limit, no score, no goal... just you and your cat.

Credits:

Art: Kenney
Pincho SFX: gamesounds.xyz
Environment SFX: freesound (Klankbeeld)
